abstract: Beer consumption has picked up in China, so much so that the country is now the world’s largest market for beer. Here’s an explanation of why that the trend is not likely to last.
snippet: Beer consumption has picked up in China, so much so that the country is now the world’s largest market for beer. Here’s an explanation of why that the trend is not likely to last.
lead_paragraph: 04/25/11 | Updated to correct figures on beer consumption in China and the Czech Republic.

headline.main: Beer Drinking and What It Says About China’s Economy
